title: Easy, Not Easy
description: Some things are easy, and some things are not! Easy, Not Easy is a delightful story full of vibrant illustrations and characters that introduce readers to examples of things that are easy and things that are not easy. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast information as well as how to correctly capitalize and punctuate simple sentences.
